articles.author: Kerich Kimtai
articles.title: Multi-tenancy in  Spring Boot
articles.description: Multi Tenancy is a software  architecture where a single software instance can serve  multiple, disting group of users.  Each user or group of users is called tenant.

articles.author: Adam Wathan
articles.title: Spring Boot graphQL
articles.description: Spring Boot with GraphQL: Powerful API development, simplified queries, efficient data fetching, and enhanced flexibility for modern applications.
